author: senh
title: The Ultimate Bucket-List Travel Guide
text: BING NEWS: Hitchhiking Robot Attempts to Travel Across the United States A hitchhiking robot is actively checking off the boxes on its personal bucket list. Appropriately named hitchBOT ... Massachusetts with San Francisco, CA being its ultimate destination. Along the way, there are several things hitchBOT would like to ... 07/17/2015 - 12:28 pm | View Link The Ultimate Bucket-List Travel Guide ROBIN ESROCK, whose book “The Great Global Bucket List” will be published next year, has traveled to 100 countries on seven continents, but he still dreams of visiting Bali. “It seems ridiculous that I’ve explored Albania and Ethiopia but have ... 07/17/2015 - 11:47 am | View Link Tastemakers Identify Favorite 'Bucket List' Destinations 5:39PM ET - GlobeNewswire Yahoo Files to Spin Off Alibaba Shares 5:35PM ET - Dow Jones Business News Yahoo Files to Spin Off Alibaba Shares -- Update 5:31PM ET - Dow Jones Business News 07/17/2015 - 11:32 am | View Link Hitchhiking robot is leaving on a cross-country trip across the U.S. See also: 26 weird museums to visit for the ultimate American road trip Along the way ... As a bucket, I am making a bucket list of things to see. Where should I go in the land of the free? #hitchBOTinUSA pic.twitter.com/cPDsbAEMJ0 — hitchBOT (@hitchBOT ... 07/17/2015 - 9:13 am | View Link Grenada: The Ultimate Destination for Water Activities With the Atlantic Ocean on one side and the Caribbean Sea on the other, this is a very diverse island, one that should display prominently on your travel bucket list!
